title: The Three Stooges. Vols. 11-13
brief_description: Compilation of three videos starring the Three Stooges in some of their funniest films. Titles include “Hokus pokus” (dir. Jules White); “Heavenly daze” (dir. Jules White); “I’m a monkey’s uncle” (dir. Jules White); “Booty & the beast” (dir. Jules White); “Flagpole jitters” (dir. Jules White); “Pardon my backfire” (dir. Jules White); “Scotch in Scotland” (dir. Jules White); “Pardon my clutch” (dir. Edward Bernds); “Cuckoo on a choo choo” (dir. Jules White). The Three Stooges consisted of Moe Howard, Shemp Howard and Larry Fine.
